# Application Developers Wanted
**Reference Number**: cb-8784-60517824
**Solicitation Number**: 20230744

**Status**: This tender opportunity is no longer accepting bids.

## Overview
The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) invites proposals from qualified Application Developers to deliver IT professional services in the National Capital Region (NCR). The selected firm will provide expertise related to software development over the next two to four fiscal years.

## Procurement Method
This is a competitive bidder process, where the most suitable proposals will be selected through a selective tendering process.

## Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on:

1. **Technical Merit**: The ability to meet the requirements outlined in the tender
2. **Price**: The total cost of the proposed services

## Important Details
* Bidders must be able to meet the requirements of the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
* The selected firm is expected to begin services on **October 2, 2023**, and continue for approximately **5 years**.
* Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Canada Buys portal.

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Aleksandra Green  
Contracting Officer  
(613) 293-5842 | [contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca](mailto:contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca)

## Attachments
A detailed description of the requirements can be found in the tender notice attached to this announcement.
